entry.title: RELX Creator Smart e-cigarettes
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电子烟
日期 2024年
任务 市场调研，产品设计

RELX Creator专为寻求可探索和互动体验的年轻用户量身打造。其设计灵感来自积木，采用模块化设计，用户可以通过原始标准化接口将设备与不同口味和容量的烟弹搭配，从而提供丰富多样的电子烟体验。此外，通过将设备的非消耗部件与烟弹的消耗部件分离，它有效地降低了长期成本和环境影响。LED像素显示屏和个性化的表情符号反馈为用户提供了更具吸引力和愉悦感的电子烟体验。
RELX Creator is tailored for younger users seeking an explorable and interactive experience. Drawing inspiration from building blocks, it features a modular design, allowing users to pair the device with pods of varying flavors and capacities through the original standardized interface, thus facilitating a rich and diverse vaping experience. Moreover, it effectively reduces long-term costs and environmental impact by separating the device's non-consumable parts from the pod's consumable parts. The LED pixel display screen and personalized emoji feedback offer users a more engaging and enjoyable e-cigarette experience.









-END-

entry.title: Waves 60 Custom Keyboard kit
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电脑周边
日期 2023年
任务 市场调研，产品设计

灵感来源于“水”，这款客制化机械键盘采用简约的轮廓设计，顶部表面呈现波浪造形，模拟水波的涟漪，捕捉住时间冻结的波浪瞬间。整体美学简洁内敛，与“水”的主题完美契合，唤起一种宁静与流动感。
Waves 60 配备镜面PVD工艺的不锈钢定位板，为键盘带来如水面般平静的反射效果。结合快速回弹的泡棉垫片，这种不锈钢定位板结构为您提供了独特的打字体验和声音表现。
Inspired by "water", the keyboard features a minimalist silhouette and a wavy pattern on the top surface to mimic the ripples of water, capturing the essence of a wave frozen in time. The overall aesthetic is restrained, aligning perfectly with the theme of "Water" and evoking a sense of tranquility and fluidity.
Waves 60 features a mirror PVD finish stainless steel plate (top mirror, bottom brushed), bringing a tranquil mirror-like reflective water surface to your keyboard, With the combination of fast-rebound gaskets, the stainless steel plate structure offers you a unique typing experience and sound profile.











-END-

entry.title: M65 Evergreen Mini Gaming Keyboard
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电脑周边
日期 2021年
任务 市场调研，产品设计

65% Layout - 68 key layout, that does away with the function row and numpad but keeps dedicated arrow keys and a column of navigation and editing buttons. Rise up the feet when typing to get extra comfort. The extra media knob is convenient and intuitive for users to control video and music.









-END-

entry.title: Tilly 60 Mechanical Keyboard
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电脑周边
日期 2021年
任务 市场调研，产品设计

The Tilly60 is a 60% layout gasket-mounted mechanical keyboard DIY kit, meticulously crafted using premium aluminum materials, ensuring exceptional durability and a superior feel. This exquisite keyboard combines sleek design with aesthetics, making it the perfect choice for those seeking a high-end experience.

Offering both HHKB and WK layout options, the compact HHKB layout ensures essential keys are easily accessible, striking a perfect balance between power and minimalism, beloved by enthusiasts of smaller form factors. Compared with HHKB, WK layout is more suitable for ordinary people to use.

The Tilly60 is meticulously built with premium aluminum, ensuring both durability and a superior feel. It features a multimedia knob for effortless volume and media control. Plus, it has a stylish ARK storage compartment for your small items, keeping your workspace neat and organized.










Photo Credit @夹克

entry.title: Zonex 75 Mechanical Keyboard
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电脑周边
日期 2021年
任务 市场调研，产品设计

ZX75 是为“少数”发烧玩家设计的一款无线机械键盘，我们将客制化机械键盘元素和玩法带到量产机械键盘领域，让键盘爱好者以更低的门槛体验到客制化机械键盘的使用乐趣。
ZX75 is a wireless mechanical keyboard designed for "a few" passionate players. We bring customized mechanical keyboard elements and gameplay to the field of mass production mechanical keyboard, so that keyboard lovers can experience the fun of using customized mechanical keyboard with a lower threshold.











-END-

entry.title: Dreamlight Zen-睡眠辅助眼罩
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 穿戴
日期 2018年
任务 市场调研，产品设计，包装设计

通过精心的设计，Dreamlight Zen 有效的为佩戴者创造了一个空间，不受到打扰无论在什么地方都可以得到充分的休息。内置橙黄色光线、多种冥想语音引导、助眠声音，同时支持蓝牙连接，满足用户多样化的使用要求。产品为可拆洗设计，取出机芯，产品外壳可以清洗，满足用户的清洁需求。
Through careful design, Dreamlight Zen effectively creates a space for the wearer to get a full rest without being disturbed, no matter where they are. Built-in orange and yellow light, a variety of meditation voice guidance, sleep aid sound, while supporting Bluetooth connection, to meet the user's diverse requirements. The product is designed for disassembly and washable, the movement is removed, and the product shell can be cleaned to meet the cleaning needs of users.





-END-

entry.title: 双枪便携式消毒餐具盒 Eco-Dining
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 餐具
日期 2016年
任务 市场调研，产品设计，包装设计

Eco-Dining 餐具盒是为在外就餐的人群设计的更便利、更健康、更环保的用餐工具。创新性的将磁吸设计应用到餐具盒，首先，用磁吸分体式开合系统有效的避免了传统的转轴、卡扣等易藏污纳垢的结构凹槽，从而提升餐具盒的易清洁性。Eco-Dining 餐具盒合上餐盒盖后， UV 消毒灯和发热片对餐具进行消毒和烘干。
Eco-Dining cutlery box is a more convenient, healthier and environmentally friendly dining tool designed for people who eat out. The innovative magnetic design is applied to the tableware box. First of all, the magnetic absorption split-type opening and closing system effectively avoids the traditional structural grooves that are easy to store dirt and dirt, such as rotating shaft and buckle, so as to improve the easy cleaning of the tableware box. After closing the lid of the Eco-Dining tableware box, the UV disinfection lamp and heating tablets disinfect and dry the tableware.



-END-

entry.title: M.2 硬盘盒-Stack
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电脑周边
日期 2019年
任务 市场调研，产品设计，包装设计

Stack 是由铝合金制成的高速 M.2 NVME 固态硬盘，散热鳍片使得产品具有更好的散热性能不需要冷却风扇。产品形状从顶部到底部逐渐变窄，波浪形为用户提供了更舒适的抓握体验。项目的灵感来自建筑，其设计理念是让用户通过设计直观的感受到产品的性能。
The Stack is a high-speed M.2 NVME SSD made of aluminum alloy, with cooling fins for better cooling performance without the need for a cooling fan. The shape of the product gradually Narrows from the top to the bottom, and the wavy shape provides a more comfortable gripping experience for the user. The project is inspired by architecture, and its design concept is to allow users to intuitively feel the performance of the product through design.







-END-

entry.title: ZX-1 Aluminum Alloy Mini-ITX Case
entry.content:
Industrial Design
Designed by Zhao-X

类别 电脑周边
日期 2020年
任务 市场调研，产品设计，包装设计

好的“物品”需要满足舒适、耐用，并能融入到生活环境中，得益于我们对机箱的多项创新设计和对外观的重新定义，ZX-1 简约的设计节省了宝贵的桌面空间，同时为创作者提供了工作站级的性能。外形设计基于铝合金挤压式一体外壳，保证了外观的一体性。磁性侧板和顶盖的设计，方便安装和系统维护。通过改变中板的位置 ZX-1 分为 9.2L 风冷版 10.6L 水冷版两个版本，可以满足不同人群对性能和体积的需求。
Good "objects" need to be comfortable, durable, and fit into the living environment, and thanks to our multiple innovative chassis designs and redefinitions of appearance, the ZX-1's minimalist design saves valuable desktop space while providing creators with workstation-like performance. The shape design is based on the aluminum alloy extrusion housing to ensure the unity of the appearance. Magnetic side panels and top cover design, easy installation and system maintenance. ZX-1 is divided by changing the position of the middle plate 9.2L air-cooled version 10.6L water-cooled version two versions, can meet the performance and volume needs of different people.










-END-
